amendatorysection.catchline: Failure to stop at weighing station or portable scale; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: The driver of any motor truck, truck-tractor, semitrailer, trailer, or towed vehicle who fails to obey any sign, message board, or in-cab signal from any state weighing station or portable scale or who knowingly passes or bypasses any state weighing station or portable scale, when the station or scale is open and being operated by an officer of the Nebraska State Patrol, is guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.
